nodes.text: The planet Wayland had a constable at the time of the Mandalorian Wars. When Wayland was attacked by the Mandalorians, the constable packed up and attempted to leave with his family. Bounty hunter Krav Noblis tried to turn in a bounty while the constable was making his exit, and when Noblis asked for a voucher from the nearby Lhosan Industries building in lieu of payment, the constable replied that the building was full of Mandalorian Basilisk droids.
